About

Born & raised in Czech Republic, I was genuinely influenced by Austrian, German & Croatian ancestors. Over 6 years in business, I have had a chance to work on variety of projects, with agencies, companies or even individuals. Custom work is my territory, branding, web design, UI/UX design, print design & of course any offline design. Synthesis of my creativity & the understanding of task are my keys to create award winning experiences.
